description: Fixed OpenSearch configuration with minimal safe settings, removed all invalid plugin configurations

changelog.7.1.1: Initial release - Core architecture, user management, case framework
changelog.7.1.2: Bugfix - Fixed requirements.txt copying and added fallback dependency installation
changelog.7.1.3: Bugfix - Fixed database path to absolute, improved service status checks, added Nginx troubleshooting
changelog.7.1.4: Bugfix - Fixed OpenSearch demo config issues, updated python-evtx to 0.8.1, disabled security plugin properly
changelog.7.1.5: Bugfix - Fixed OpenSearch temp directory creation, ensures all required directories exist
changelog.7.1.6: Bugfix - Fixed OpenSearch startup timeouts, optimized config, disabled unnecessary plugins, dynamic heap sizing
changelog.7.1.7: Enhancement - Comprehensive installer verbosity, detailed service monitoring, API response verification, extensive troubleshooting guidance
changelog.7.1.8: Bugfix - Fixed OpenSearch 2.11.1 compatibility by removing invalid plugin settings causing AbstractScopedSettings errors
changelog.7.1.9: Bugfix - Simplified OpenSearch config to minimal safe settings, removed all problematic plugin configurations
